verses.verse: There were <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> that <S%G2540>season<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> that <S%G518>told<s%> him of the <S%G1057>Galilaeans,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> had <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with their <S%G2378>sacrifices.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1380>Suppose<s%> you that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1057>Galilaeans<s%> were <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1057>Galilaeans,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> things?
I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3780>No:<s%> but, <S%G3362>except<s%> you <S%G3340>repent,<s%> you shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> eighteen, <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G4444>tower<s%> in <S%G4611>Siloam<s%> <S%G4098>fell,<s%> and <S%G615>slew<s%> them, <S%G1380>think<s%> you that they were <S%G3781>sinners<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in Jerusalem? <S%G2419><s%>
I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3780>No:<s%> but, <S%G3362>except<s%> you <S%G3340>repent,<s%> you shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

He <S%G3004>spoke<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable;<s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> in his <S%G290>vineyard;<s%> and he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> thereon, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he to the <S%G289>dresser<s%> of his <S%G289>vineyard,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> these <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> and <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3756>none:<s%> <S%G1581>cut<s%> it <S%G1581>down;<s%> <S%G2444>why<s%> <S%G2673>encumbers<s%> it the ground? <S%G1093><s%>

And he <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G863>let<s%> it <S%G863>alone<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I shall <S%G4626>dig<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> it, and dung <S%G906><s%> <S%G2874><s%> it:
And <S%G2579>if<s%> it <S%G4160>bear<s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> well: and <S%G1487>if<s%> not, then after <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3195><s%> that you shall <S%G1581>cut<s%> it down. <S%G1581><s%>
And he was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in <S%G3391>one<s%> of the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G1135>woman<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G769>infirmity<s%> <S%G1176>eighteen<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> and was <S%G4794>bowed<s%> <S%G4794>together,<s%> and <S%G1410>could<s%> in <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3588>wise<s%> <S%G3838><s%> <S%G352>lift<s%> up herself.

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> her, he <S%G4377>called<s%> her to him, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> you are <S%G630>loosed<s%> from <S%G4675>your<s%> infirmity. <S%G769><s%>
And he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> her: and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she was <S%G461>made<s%> <S%G461>straight,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G752>ruler<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> with <S%G23>indignation,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2323>healed<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3793>people,<s%> There are <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> men <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G2038>work:<s%> in them <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> and be <S%G2323>healed,<s%> and not on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G5273>hypocrite,<s%> does not <S%G1538>each<s%> one of you on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G3089>loose<s%> his <S%G1016>ox<s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G3688>ass<s%> from the <S%G5336>stall,<s%> and lead <S%G520><s%> him <S%G520>away<s%> to watering? <S%G4222><s%>

And <S%G1163>ought<s%> not <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> has <S%G1210>bound,<s%> <S%G2400>see,<s%> these <S%G1176>eighteen<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> from <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G1199>bond<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day? <S%G2250><s%>

And when he had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G480>adversaries<s%> were <S%G2617>ashamed:<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1741>glorious<s%> things that were <S%G1096>done<s%> by him.
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he, To <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3664>like?<s%> and <S%G5101>whereunto<s%> shall I <S%G3666>resemble<s%> it?

It is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of <S%G4615>mustard<s%> seed, <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>took,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2779>garden;<s%> and it <S%G837>grew,<s%> and <S%G1096>waxed<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1186>tree;<s%> and the <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2681>lodged<s%> in the <S%G2798>branches<s%> of it.
And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Whereunto<s%> shall I <S%G3666>liken<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

It is <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G1470>hid<s%> in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4568>measures<s%> of <S%G224>meal,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> was leavened. <S%G2220><s%>

And he <S%G1279>went<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> and <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching,<s%> and <S%G4197>journeying<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> are there <S%G3641>few<s%> that be <S%G4982>saved?<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them,

<S%G75>Strive<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> in <S%G1223>at<s%> the <S%G4728>strait<s%> <S%G4439>gate:<s%> for <S%G4183>many,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, will <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> in, and shall not be able. <S%G2480><s%>

When once the <S%G3617>master<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> up, and has <S%G608>shut<s%> to the <S%G2374>door,<s%> and you <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1854>without,<s%> and to <S%G2925>knock<s%> at the <S%G2374>door,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G455>open<s%> to us; and he shall <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G2046>say<s%> to you, I <S%G1492>know<s%> you not from <S%G4159>where<s%> you are:

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall you <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5315>eaten<s%> and <S%G4095>drunk<s%> in your <S%G1799>presence,<s%> and you have <S%G1321>taught<s%> in our streets. <S%G4113><s%>

But he shall <S%G2046>say,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, I <S%G1492>know<s%> you not from <S%G4159>where<s%> you are; <S%G868>depart<s%> from me, all <S%G3956><s%> you <S%G2040>workers<s%> of iniquity. <S%G93><s%>

<S%G1563>There<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and you yourselves <S%G1544>thrust<s%> out.

And they shall come <S%G2240><s%> from the <S%G395>east,<s%> and from the <S%G1424>west,<s%> and from the <S%G1005>north,<s%> and from the <S%G3558>south,<s%> and shall <S%G347>sit<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there are <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall be <S%G4413>first,<s%> and there are <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall be last. <S%G2078><s%>

The <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> there <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G1831>Get<s%> you out, and <S%G4198>depart<s%> <S%G1782>hence:<s%> for <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> you.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>Go<s%> you, and <S%G2036>tell<s%> that <S%G258>fox,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils,<s%> and I <S%G2005>do<s%> <S%G2392>cures<s%> to <S%G4594>day<s%> and to <S%G839>morrow,<s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> day I shall be perfected. <S%G5048><s%>

<S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4198>walk<s%> to <S%G4594>day,<s%> and to <S%G839>morrow,<s%> and the day <S%G2192>following:<s%> for it cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1735><s%> be that a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> out of Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

O <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G3036>stone<s%> them that are <S%G649>sent<s%> to you; <S%G4212>how<s%> <S%G4212>often<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I have <S%G1996>gathered<s%> your <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1996>together,<s%> as a hen <S%G3733><s%> does gather her <S%G3555>brood<s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her <S%G4420>wings,<s%> and you <S%G2309>would<s%> not!

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G863>left<s%> to you <S%G2048>desolate:<s%> and <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, You shall not <S%G1492>see<s%> me, until <S%G2193><s%> the time <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you shall <S%G2036>say,<s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
